Package com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy

Class HumanPlayerStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.Strategy
com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.strategy.HumanPlayerStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class HumanPlayerStrategy extends Strategy implements Serializable
Class that implements the Human Player Strategy This class extends the parent Strategy class which has createOrder method to be implemented here.

      public String createAdvanceOrder()
      Description copied from class: Strategy
